name: Malav Rana
headline: Software Engineer · Frontend Specialist
availability: Open to full-time or freelance engagements
summary: Software engineer with 4+ years of experience building responsive apps with React, Angular, Vue, and Next.js across streaming, architecture, healthcare, and nonprofit teams.
Transform product vision into accessible, high-performing experiences with HTML5, CSS/Tailwind, REST/GraphQL integrations, and automated delivery pipelines.
Collaborative teammate who mentors peers, iterates quickly, and finds balance competing on the tennis court.

achievements: Ship responsive, high-performing event experiences with React, Vue.js, and Tailwind CSS.
Build reusable component libraries shared across live streaming properties.
Integrate GraphQL and REST APIs to deliver real-time, interactive fan experiences.
Delivered SEO-ready marketing and project apps with Next.js and React.
Maintained complex state with Redux and React Hooks to keep experiences fast.
Collaborated with UX to transform Figma concepts into accessible production UI.
Crafted checkout flows in React that reduced form errors and improved completion rates.
Leveraged custom hooks/Context API to share logic across medication workflows.
Optimized load times with lazy-loading, code splitting, and rendering best practices.
Redesigned donation platform in React and Angular to raise conversions and accessibility.
Implemented AWS + Docker + Jenkins pipelines for reliable releases.
Integrated GraphQL/REST services to keep donor data accurate in real time.

expertise.label: Front-End Platforms
expertise.description: React, Angular, Vue, and Next.js experiences tuned for performance and maintainability.

expertise.label: Design Systems & UX
expertise.description: HTML5, CSS, Tailwind, and accessibility-led implementation with collaboration alongside designers.

expertise.label: Delivery & Tooling
expertise.description: GraphQL/REST integrations, automated testing, Git/AWS/Docker/Jenkins pipelines, and package management with PNPM.
